record.dc:title: 258BN30 Lick Creek, Benton County, Tennessee. Burials 14BN3, 14BN4, 14BN5, 14BN6 and 14BN7. Burial 14BN3 - extended adult foreground, head NW. 14BN4 - lower torso and legs, on back, extended legs only present. 14BN5 - skull and bits of legs. 14BN6 - lone skull. 14BN7 - skull and misc. bones. 14BN3 - Stratum I, bottom. Other burials Stratum I, top. Square 51L4. Direction Southwest.
record.wpa:narrative: [14BN3] Indeterminate adult in poor condition, complete, but decayed. Extended, flesh burial on back, arms at sides, head to NW. Typical Mississippi - but poor. [14BN4, 5, 6 and 7] Indeterminate adult in poor condition and fragmentary. Extended, flesh burial on back with head to SW. Possibly skull 14BN6 goes with burial 14BN4. 14BN7 is possibly parts of 14BN5 and 14BN4. Several poor and fragmentary burials.
